title: Pretrain NLP embeddings
body_html:
I found a lot of pretrain CNN models in tf.contrib.keras.applications. Nevertheless, for NLP researchers there is no even well-know GoogleNews word2vec vectors or Glove, or...something.

Is it possible to add functionality for simplified embedding download and future usage? Some official maybe_download_google_news_w2v or something like that.
body_text:
I found a lot of pretrain CNN models in tf.contrib.keras.applications. Nevertheless, for NLP researchers there is no even well-know GoogleNews word2vec vectors or Glove, or...something.
Is it possible to add functionality for simplified embedding download and future usage? Some official maybe_download_google_news_w2v or something like that.
body:
I found a lot of pretrain CNN models in `tf.contrib.keras.applications`. Nevertheless, for NLP researchers there is no even well-know GoogleNews word2vec vectors or Glove, or...something. 

Is it possible to add functionality for simplified embedding download and future usage? Some official `maybe_download_google_news_w2v` or something like that.
